sources.title: The Very Idea (1929) SALLY BLANEüçï PRE-CODE COMEDYüçï FULL MOVIE
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Sally Blane, Doris Eaton, Hugh Trevor, Frank Craven
Directed by:  Frank Craven, Richard Rosson
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLmHgXUJMN1TUzR3YhpzxOuBM6YrZ91UVG
 üçï STARRING SALLY BLANE, THE YOUNGER SISTER OF LORETTA YOUNGüçï
A jaw-dropping, taboo-smashing farce, straight from the wildest chapter of Pre-code Hollywood! When a wealthy young couple can't conceive, a smug eugenics author proposes a shocking idea: recruit two perfect specimens‚Äîthe beautiful Sally Blane and dashing Hugh Trevor‚Äîto have a child for them. A sharp, humorous look at unconventional family planning through the lens of early 20th-century science and social satire.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

Be sure to LIKE, COMMENT, and SUBSCRIBE for more rare, vintage films every WEEK on PizzaFLIX.

Adapted from a stage play by William Le Baron and brought to the screen by RKO Productions, this daring comedy features Sally Blane and Hugh Trevor as the unsuspecting pair enlisted to produce the ideal baby. The cast also includes Frank Craven, Allen Kearns, Doris Eaton, and Dorothy Hall, adding charm and chaos to this outrageous premise.

Ideal for fans of early, stage-to-screen adaptations and vintage Hollywood comedies.

#fullmovie #The Very Idea #Eugenics #PreCodeHollywood #ClassicCinema #classiccomedy #RKO # RadioPictures #FrankCraven #SallyBlane #OldHollywood #FilmHistory #EarlyTalkies #RareMovies #HughTrevor #PreCodeHollywood #ClassicMovieMonday #PizzaFLIX

metadata.Plot: A Eugenics expert convinces his sister and her husband, a barren couple, to adopt the offspring of his carefully selected "thoroughbreds": the family's chauffeur and maid who themselves are engaged.
metadata.Actors: Frank Craven, Hugh Trevor, Sally Blane
